.wp-block-group.employee-card-section .wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile {
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.wp-block-columns.is-not-stacked-on-mobile > .wp-block-column:not(:first-child) {
  margin-left: 0;
}

.employee-card-container:not(:first-of-type) {
  margin-top: 0;
}

.employee-card-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 4rem;
}

.wp-block-dbc-db-team-card {
  width: 475px;
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: 15px;
  background-color: #305c84;
  margin: auto;
  color: white;
  overflow: hidden;
}

  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 165%;
}

  z-index: 10;
  position: relative;
  font-size: 2.25rem;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 0.75rem 0 -0.75rem;
}

  text-align: center;
  font-size: 1.75rem;
  margin: 0.75rem 0 -0.45rem;
}

  margin-top: 2rem;
}

  border-top-left-radius: 15px;
  border-top-right-radius: 15px;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 1.2rem;
  height: 180px;
  margin-bottom: 120px;
}

  height: 180px;
  margin-bottom: 120px;
}

  width: 65%;
}

  border-radius: 100%;
  width: 55%;
  padding: 2.5rem;
  background-color: #264159;
}

  border-radius: 100%;
  max-height: 250px;
  padding: 2.5rem;
  background-color: #264159;
}

  padding: 2rem;
}

  }

<style id="dbc-showcase-block-style-inline-css" type="text/css">
/*!*********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************!*\
  !*** css ./node_modules/css-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[3].use[1]!./node_modules/postcss-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[3].use[2]!./node_modules/sass-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[3].use[3]!./src/db_showcase_block/style.scss ***!
  \*********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
.db-showcase {
  padding: 0;
  min-height: 500px;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.db-showcase img {
  max-width: unset;
  height: unset;
}
.db-showcase button.previous,
.db-showcase button.next {
  display: none;
}

.db-showcase ul {
  list-style-type: none;
}

.title-selector {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-evenly;
  gap: 2.5rem;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0;
  margin-top: 2rem;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.title-selector li {
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
}

.title-selector input {
  width: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
}

.title-selector label {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 1rem;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
     -moz-user-select: none;
      -ms-user-select: none;
          user-select: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  transition: all 0.1s linear;
  border: 2px solid transparent;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.title-selector label:hover {
  border: 2px solid white;
}

.title-selector input:checked + label {
  color: #264059;
  background-color: white;
}

.title-info {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}

.storePages {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 0;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.storePages > li {
  height: 50px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.storePages > li img {
  display: block;
  height: 100%;
  background-size: contain;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center;
}

.singleTitle {
  opacity: 0;
  height: 340px;
  visibility: hidden;
  margin: 0;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 8rem 2rem 5rem;
  background-position: center;
  background-size: cover;
  background: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5));
  position: relative;
}

.title-info:before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  pointer-events: none;
  background-color: #252525;
  z-index: -10;
}

.logoContainer {
  width: 500px;
  height: auto;
  text-align: center;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

img.titleLogo {
  width: 80%;
  height: auto;
}

.excerptContainer {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
  justify-content: center;
  min-width: 300px;
  max-width: 35%;
  height: 100%;
  flex: 1 2 50%;
}

.excerptContainer p {
  color: white;
  line-height: 160%;
  margin-top: 0;
}

.learnMoreButton {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  text-decoration: none;
  background-color: #3abb99;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  border-radius: 6px;
  transition: all 0.1s linear;
}

.learnMoreButton:hover {
  background-color: #2d967a;
}

.fade-out {
  display: none;
  -webkit-animation-name: "fade-out";
          animation-name: "fade-out";
  -webkit-animation-duration: 0.1s;
          animation-duration: 0.1s;
  -webkit-animation-fill-mode: forwards;
          animation-fill-mode: forwards;
}

.fade-in {
  display: flex;
  -webkit-animation-name: "fade-in";
          animation-name: "fade-in";
  -webkit-animation-duration: 0.1s;
          animation-duration: 0.1s;
  -webkit-animation-fill-mode: forwards;
          animation-fill-mode: forwards;
}

@-webkit-keyframes fade-out {
  0% {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  90% {
    opacity: 0.1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
}

@keyframes fade-out {
  0% {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  90% {
    opacity: 0.1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
}
@-webkit-keyframes fade-in {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  10% {
    opacity: 0.1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
}
@keyframes fade-in {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  10% {
    opacity: 0.1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1100px) {
  .db-showcase button.previous,
.db-showcase button.next {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 1rem;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.74) solid 2px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.452);
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 50;
    color: white;
    line-height: 100%;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .db-showcase button.previous:hover,
.db-showcase button.next:hover {
    background-color: rgba(173, 173, 173, 0.452);
  }

  button.previous {
    left: 15px;
  }

  button.next {
    right: 15px;
  }

  .chevron::before {
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0.25em 0.25em 0 0;
    content: "";
    display: inline-block;
    height: 0.45em;
    left: 0.15em;
    position: relative;
    top: 0.15em;
    transform: rotate(-45deg);
    vertical-align: top;
    width: 0.45em;
  }

  .chevron.right:before {
    left: -0.1em;
    transform: rotate(45deg);
  }

  .chevron.left:before {
    left: 0.1em;
    transform: rotate(-135deg);
  }

  .title-selector {
    gap: 1rem;
    width: unset;
    padding: 0 75px;
    margin-top: 4.5rem;
  }

  .title-selector label {
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .singleTitle {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .excerptContainer {
    max-width: 600px;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: flex-start;
  }

  .learnMoreButton {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .storePages {
    justify-content: center;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 782px) {
  .title-selector li {
    flex-basis: 40%;
  }

  .title-selector li label {
    width: 100%;
    padding-left: 0;
    padding-right: 0;
  }

  .singleTitle {
    padding-top: 11rem;
    padding-left: 1rem;
    padding-right: 1rem;
  }

  img.titleLogo {
    width: 60%;
  }

  .logoContainer {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .excerptContainer {
    min-width: initial;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 460px) {
  img.titleLogo {
    width: 100%;
  }
}

<style id="dbc-other-games-style-inline-css" type="text/css">
/*!******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************!*\
  !*** css ./node_modules/css-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[3].use[1]!./node_modules/postcss-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[3].use[2]!./node_modules/sass-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[3].use[3]!./src/db_other_games/style.scss ***!
  \******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
.dbc-related-games-container .wp-block-columns {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 2rem;
  margin: 4rem 0 0;
}

.dbc-related-games-container .wp-block-column {
  max-width: 250px;
}

.other-games-card {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  border-radius: 15px;
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  height: 250px;
}
.other-games-card:hover {
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.473);
}
.other-games-card .logo {
  height: 225px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}
.other-games-card .logo img {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 1250px) {
  .dbc-related-games-cards {
    align-items: center;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .dbc-related-games-cards .wp-block-column {
    margin-left: 0 !important;
  }

  .other-games-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=style-index.css.map*/
</style>

<div class="wp-container-2 wp-block-group dbc-hero-main"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container">
<h1 class="dbc-hero-headline has-white-color">Infinite Realities in an Augmented World</h1>



<div class="wp-container-1 wp-block-group dbc-flourish"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"></div></div>



<p class="dbc-hero-subhead has-white-color">Located in Bellevue, WA, DB Creations crafts reality-defining AR games that bring playerâ€™s imaginations into the real world</p>



<div style="height:15px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
</div></div>



<div class="wp-container-3 wp-block-group dbc-hero-cta has-white-color"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container">
<p class="has-white-color">Questions about our games or company?</p>



<div class="wp-block-button dbc-hero-cta-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link">Contact</a></div>



<div style="height:125px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
</div></div>
</div></div>
</div></div>
</div>



<section id="partnerships" class="wp-container-5 wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container">
<h2 class="is-style-dbcreations-heading">Partnerships</h2>



<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide">
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:350px">
<figure class="wp-block-image alignfull size-full"><img loading="lazy" width="449" height="171" src="https://dbcreations.studio//wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Frame-47.png" alt="" class="wp-image-197" srcset="https://dbcreations.studio/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Frame-47.png 449w, https://dbcreations.studio/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Frame-47-300x114.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 449px) 100vw, 449px"></figure>



<p class="has-text-align-center"><a href="https://techcrunch.com/2022/04/12/snap-fifth-cohort-yellow-accelerator-startups/?guccounter=1&amp;guce_referrer=aHR0cHM6Ly9tYWlsLmdvb2dsZS5jb20v&amp;guce_referrer_sig=AQAAAJtqin75kPnyQWkAXOjk-tTD-FOwBBOnqlSarAhc08Gz1tBQHzm8pVWYUO8xtrC_VtW2ryqtnlBOnQKGFDVh5fXWeZ25_qbaAyEaMjMHaElqcyKVghj7uAFzXwcv9vSSfjBNkvyEV0sdl1nesKVDZ85TaRWYgQvTQIFvnAq1FL7R" data-type="URL" data-id="https://techcrunch.com/2022/04/12/snap-fifth-cohort-yellow-accelerator-startups/?guccounter=1&amp;guce_referrer=aHR0cHM6Ly9tYWlsLmdvb2dsZS5jb20v&amp;guce_referrer_sig=AQAAAJtqin75kPnyQWkAXOjk-tTD-FOwBBOnqlSarAhc08Gz1tBQHzm8pVWYUO8xtrC_VtW2ryqtnlBOnQKGFDVh5fXWeZ25_qbaAyEaMjMHaElqcyKVghj7uAFzXwcv9vSSfjBNkvyEV0sdl1nesKVDZ85TaRWYgQvTQIFvnAq1FL7R">Snapchat Yellow Accelerator<br>Class of 2022</a></p>
</div>

</div>
</div>
</div></section>


    <section class="db-showcase" id="db-showcase-block">

		<ul class="title-info">
            <li class="singleTitle fade-in" id="selection-288" style="background: linear-gradient( rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65)), url(&quot;https://dbcreations.studio/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/OLR-background.png&quot;); background-size: cover;">
            <div class="logoContainer">
                <img class="titleLogo" src="https://dbcreations.studio/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Logo-Final-1024x1024.png">
            </div>
            <div class="excerptContainer">
                <p>In Operation Living Room, transform your space into a battlefield right before your eyes! Using the power of AR, spawn a dynamic game map and battle it out with a friend or the AI and fight to keep all your towers standing. Built in partnership with Snapchatâ€™s Ghost Innovation Lab!</p>
                <a class="learnMoreButton" href="https://dbcreations.studio/games/operation-living-room/">Learn More</a>
                <ul class="storePages">

            </div> 
        </li>

            <div class="logoContainer">
                <img class="titleLogo" src="https://dbcreations.studio/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/logo-table-trenches.png">
            </div>
            <div class="excerptContainer">
                <p>In Table Trenches, your table transforms into the battlefield! Capture towers, deploy units, and fight to the last in this real-time tactics game, designed for AR. The 4 commanders each have their own unique units and tactics â€“ smash the enemy with Loganâ€™s mighty walkers, or melt their towers to theâ€¦</p>

<section id="dbc-team-card-blocks" class="wp-container-6 wp-block-group employee-card-section"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container">
<h2 class="has-text-align-center is-style-dbcreations-heading">Founders</h2>



<p class="is-style-dbcreations-lede">DB Creations is a team of experienced game developers that create awesome VR and AR games. With backgrounds in AAA game development at Bungie and enterprise HoloLens applications, we bring agility, passion and technical expertise to the growing worldwide VR and AR markets.</p>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-not-stacked-on-mobile employee-card-container">
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:520px">
<div class="wp-block-dbc-db-team-card"><div class="dbc-card-container" id="dbc-team-card-blocks"><header class="dbc-card-head"><h3>Founder</h3><div class="dbc-card-image"><img src="https://dbcreations.studio//wp-content/uploads/2022/03/blake.jpg"></div></header><main class="dbc-card-body"><h4>Blake Gross</h4><p>Blake is an experienced software engineer and designer in the AR/MR space. His core role in DB Creations is leading the engineering of products and future product direction. He has previous experience as a senior engineer and tech lead in the Mixed Reality Apps division of Microsoft.</p></main></div></div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:520px">
<div class="wp-block-dbc-db-team-card"><div class="dbc-card-container" id="dbc-team-card-blocks"><header class="dbc-card-head"><h3>Founder</h3><div class="dbc-card-image"><img src="https://dbcreations.studio//wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Dustin-Headshot-scaled-e1651551089522.jpg"></div></header><main class="dbc-card-body"><h4>Dustin Kochensparger</h4><p>Dustin is a producer and designer with almost a decade of experience working in video games. With a passion for project management and team leadership, he leads the design and production for every game DB Creations develops. He is passionate about bringing games to emerging technologies, using novel designs to play to their strengths.</p></main></div></div>
</div>
</div>
</div></section>



<section id="dbc-who-we-are" class="wp-container-7 wp-block-group has-background" style="background-color:#f3f3f3"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container">
<h2 class="has-text-align-center is-style-dbcreations-heading">Who we are</h2>



<p class="is-style-dbcreations-lede">Founded in 2015 by college best friends Blake and Dustin, DB Creations&nbsp; is a studio that pushes the bounds of whatâ€™s possible. With a focus on building cutting edge games and apps for emerging platforms, the founders first created Chimera Reader â€“ the worldâ€™s most downloaded VR eBook reader. </p>



<p></p>



<p class="is-style-dbcreations-lede">In 2020, DB Creations shipped Table Trenches, an AR strategy game for mobile phones and AR headsets, which was the first AR game to be included in Google Play Pass; and Rhythm â€˜n Bullets, a VR SHMUP available on all major VR platforms, including PSVR. In 2021, DB Creations partnered with Snapchatâ€™s Ghost Innovation lab to build a Operation Living Room, a next-generation AR strategy game, out now on Snapchat.</p>



<p></p>



<p class="is-style-dbcreations-lede">The studio graduated from the 2022 spring cohort of the Snapchat Yellow Accelerator, and is now working with partners to build incredible new AR games.</p>
</div></section>



<section id="dbc-ideals" class="wp-container-8 wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container">
<h2 class="has-text-align-center is-style-dbcreations-heading">Our ideals</h2>



<h3 class="is-style-dbcreations-sub-heading">Studio Mission</h3>



<p class="is-style-dbcreations-lede">To build new realities that transform the familiar world around our players â€“ games they could only dream about until now.</p>



<h3 class="is-style-dbcreations-sub-heading">Studio Vision</h3>



<p class="is-style-dbcreations-lede">Use the power of games to bring to life the imagination of players of all ages, around the world, in order to create a world where play is anywhere you dream of it.</p>



<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
</div></section>



<section class="wp-container-11 wp-block-group has-background" style="background-color:#f3f3f3"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container">
